fields.headline: Flights to link isles
fields.bodyText: Traditional Greek ferry services face competition from inter-island flights linking Corfu, Lefkada, Cephallonia and Zakynthos. Fares will be from 23-40 euros (£13-£25) and the flights will take 10-30 minutes compared with ferry journeys of up to nine hours. A limited service on 30- or 40-seat aircraft will start in February, followed by a busier summer timetable from April to October. Details will be posted in January when the newly formed Ionian Islands Tourist Board launches its website (visit-ionianislands.com).
